title: #21: The Murder of Reeva Steenkamp by Oscar Pistorius
description:
Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti provide an insight into the relationship between Reeva Steenkamp and Oscar Pistorius before Reeva was murdered on February 14, 2013. #herNameWasReeva
